channel.title: Readdle Documents 5 Multiple Evers
channel.description:
Hi Folks, Is it possible for someone to make an action to send multiple calendar events to Readdle Calendar 5 ?. I know it exists for Fantastical, but I do not love the Fantastical App for iOS.
Many thanks
Jeremy

item.title: Readdle Documents 5 Multiple Evers
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Here’s the URL scheme. You would want to make use of the ‘parse’ option and express the event as a sentence.

https://helpspot.readdle.com/calendars/index.php?pg=kb.page&id=1228

Read full topic
